page.title: 13Hartfield - May Festival
page.content: It was the 23rd of May and it was May Festival day.The event began in the afternoon which was sunny and dry. The first half began with a procession through the village,churchyard to the school.The May Queen was Georgia Arnott.As she was crowned the Hartfield Hoppers made a guard of honour.By this time a lot of parents had arrived to watch.Soon the maypole dances started.These included the spiders web and barber's pole.There were musicians playing the recorder.I (Amy) was one of them.As we were thirsty we had orange, the parents had tea and cakes.Two guitarists played a piece called the Drummers Reel.There was also a competition for miniture gardens. There was more dances; gypsies tent and reels.Some people went round giving out posies to the parents. We all had a lovely day.
